title: OT19: Don’t Thread On Me
summary:
Key ideas:
- Scott (the author) has noticed a significant drop in his blog readership since February 20th
- He can't find any evidence that this is due to a change in WordPress statistics
- He is asking his readers if they left around that time and if anything happened to cause them to stop reading

Key learnings:
- Sudden drops in readership can be concerning to bloggers
- Asking for feedback from readers can be useful in understanding why readership has declined

Key questions:
- Did any readers leave the blog around February 20th?
- Was there anything that happened on February 20th that made readers want to stop reading the blog?
